intro: Deinostigma cicatricosum, commonly known as the scarred starwort, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Asteraceae. It is characterized by its distinctive, star-shaped flowers that are typically yellow or orange in color. The plant has a hairy stem and narrow, lance-shaped leaves that are arranged alternately along the stem. It is native to certain regions of South America and thrives in moist, temperate climates. Deinostigma cicatricosum is often found in open woodlands and along streambanks, where it plays a role in local ecosystems.
